subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
Age, Chronological
lead_paragraph: In a rapid change in the N.F.L., teams are favoring younger, less-experienced coaches, putting a fresh face on football and sending coaching graybeards to the sideline.
snippet: In a rapid change in the N.F.L., teams are favoring younger, less-experienced coaches, putting a fresh face on football and sending coaching graybeards to the sideline.
